mapper.select: SELECT PROGRAM_ID, CHAIN_CLASS, PROGRAM_NAME, PROGRAM_CONTENTS, THUMBNAIL_ID, PICTURE_ID, TEACHING_PLAN_IMG_ID, STATUS, REG_ID, REG_DATE, UPD_ID, UPD_DATE FROM STORE_PROGRAM WHERE PROGRAM_ID = #{programId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_PROGRAM ( CHAIN_CLASS, PROGRAM_NAME, PROGRAM_CONTENTS, THUMBNAIL_ID, PICTURE_ID, TEACHING_PLAN_IMG_ID, STATUS, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{chainClass}, #{programName}, #{programContents}, #{thumbnailId}, #{pictureId}, #{teachingPlanImgId}, #{status}, #{regId}, NOW() )
